com.thinkaurelius.titan.diskstorage.util.time

Interface Timepoint

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Comparable<Timepoint>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    StandardTimepoint

    public interface Timepoint
extends Comparable<Timepoint>
    An instant in time backed by a TimestampProvider

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Timepoint add(Duration addend)
      Returns a new Timepoint which is the given duration later in time.
      long getNativeTimestamp()
      Returns the elapsed time since UNIX epoch of this time point in the native unit.
      TimeUnit getNativeUnit()
      Returns the native time unit of this time point as given by the backing TimestampProvider.
      TimestampProvider getProvider()
      Returns the backing TimestampProvider.
      long getTimestamp(TimeUnit targetUnit)
      Returns this timepoint as the elapsed time since UNIX epoch in the given time unit.
      Timepoint sleepPast()
      Causes this thread to sleep past this time point.
      Timepoint sub(Duration subtrahend)
      Returns a new Timepoint that is the given duration earlier in time.

      • Methods inherited from interface java.lang.Comparable

        compareTo
